column1:
Low effort plants for your apartment


You have any? What are some good ones? Plants that can survive even when I go on 1-2 week trips would be nice. Plants that can survive dark winter months would be nice too.

LIRR pronunciation


I'm worried I'm saying this wrong. I've been saying "ell-eye-arr-arrr" since I've been riding it for the past year, but I I've heard people saying it "ell-eye double-arr". Is that standard?

"Lurrrr" seems straight out.

What's it like living in Roosevelt Island?


Anyone live in Roosevelt Island, what's it like out there? How is access to supermarkets, things to do, restaurants and commuting into the city?
